results.title: Ivana Trump’s Death Is Ruled Accidental
results.abstract: Ms. Trump, an ex-wife of former President Donald J. Trump, died by blunt impact injuries, according to New York City’s chief medical examiner.

media.caption: Ivana Trump, who was a fixture on New York City’s social scene for decades, was found dead at her home on the Upper East Side on Thursday.
media.copyright: Jason Decrow/Associated Press
